first_translate: I’ll make sure you have more fun with me than with lady livia.
idiom_translate: you’ll have more fun with me than you will with lady livia.
label: I bet you'll enjoy being with me more than being with lady livia.
idiom:
이건 좀 먹혔다 : This had some effect
얼굴을 너무 남발하는 거 아냐?! : Aren't you overusing your looks?!
입장을 바꿔서 상상해 봐 : Put yourself in my shoes
양다리 걸치는 건 절대 안 돼 : You can't two-time
마음이 떠나면 확실히 끝내야지! : If your heart has left, end it clearly!
저런 까칠한 성격이라면 여자한테도 금방 차일 거야! : With that prickly personality, he'll get dumped in no time!
설마 차이는 건 아니겠지 : No way I'm getting dumped, right?

얼굴을 너무 남발하는 거 아냐?! : Aren't you overusing your looks?!
입장을 바꿔서 상상해 봐 : Put yourself in my shoes
양다리 걸치는 건 절대 안 돼 : You can't two-time
마음이 떠나면 확실히 끝내야지! : If your heart has left, end it clearly!
저런 까칠한 성격이라면 여자한테도 금방 차일 거야! : With that prickly personality, he'll get dumped in no time!
설마 차이는 건 아니겠지 : No way I'm getting dumped, right?
